item.title: SYN Cookies & Linux
item.description: This started as debugging application timeouts and turned into a deep dive into linux tcp ip stack writing my own netlink query tools. Might be long. Might be rambling. Any comments appreciated. Recently when debugging a timeout issues on a java application, I stumbled upon an interesting problem. The application was making requests to a Loab balancer virtual IP and getting a connection timeout exception in the logs. Unsure of why this was i went poking into nstat counters to see how the LBdealing with all its connections.
